name: More Room for Improvement
description:
A simple game that utilizes perspective to solve puzzles! Can you help Otis become comfortable by making his room bigger?

*** DO NOT PRESS EXIT ON THE WEB VERSION. IF YOU DO, PLEASE REFRESH PAGE ***

Some controls need to be unlocked before being able to use.
WASD - Move
Spacebar - Interact/Pickup
X - Return Item to Original Position
E - Camera1
R - Camera2

Made for Indie Tales Game Jam 2021. Everything created by me within 48 hours. All sound effects recorded by microphone (for better or worse).
https://twitter.com/GOMB_Games
